title: GaveCoin
author: GaveCoin
created_time: July 25, 2022, 08:26:30 PMLast edit: August 12, 2022, 01:43:02 AM by GaveCoin
content: Grave is a digital currency that sends 1% to a dead wallet from each transaction. Thus, the number of coins will gradually decrease, which means there will be demand. The more circulating capacity and placement of masternodes, the less coins will be in circulation. So what's good:No PremineNo PresaleHonest LaunchBurning wallet blacklisted51% ProtectionNo Founders RewardCoin:Algo: GhostRiderTicker: GVCTotal Supply: 21 billionBurn with transaction: 1%Links:Website: https://gavecoin.comExplorer: https://explorer.gavecoin.comDocumentation: https://docs.gavecoin.comGithub: https://github.com/gavecoinDiscord: https://discord.gg/ZT9bkExPEUTelegram: https://t.me/gavecoinContacts for communication:Email: static@gavecoin.comTelegram: https://t.me/GaveMasterDiscord: GaveCoin#4721Mining:Official Pool: https://pool.gavecoin.comDownload MinerWyvern CPU miner: https://github.com/WyvernTKC/cpuminer-gr-avx2/releasesXMRig CPU miner: https://github.com/xmrig/xmrigHow to Setup Smart Node:https://docs.gavecoin.com/#Install_SmartnodeSince we started the project. There are new partners and new links.Pools: https://crimson-pool.com/index.html?#gvnhttps://pool.rplant.xyz/#gavecoinExchange:Partners:https://discord.gg/hr735Wcrhttps://discord.gg/eHzNXmpAdded a new exchange. Now you can easily trade via links.https://www.bitoreum.exchange/trading/gvcusdthttps://www.bitoreum.exchange/trading/gvcbtrmhttps://www.ravendax.com/trading/gvcusdthttps://www.ravendax.com/trading/gvcdogehttps://www.ravendax.com/trading/gvckawhttps://discord.gg/GsWDVJERneAdded a new pool.More details below the linkhttps://miningpoolstats.stream/gavecoin

comments.author: FlaJa
comments.body: Quote from: GaveCoin on July 25, 2022, 08:26:30 PMhttps://gavecoin.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/about.pngGrave is a digital currency that sends 10% to a dead wallet from each transaction. Thus, the number of coins will gradually decrease, which means there will be demand. The more circulating capacity and placement of masternodes, the less coins will be in circulation. So what's good:No PremineNo PresaleHonest LaunchBurning wallet blacklisted51% ProtectionNo Founders RewardCoin:Algo: GhostRiderTicker: GVCTotal Supply: 21 billionBurn with transaction: 1%Links:Website: https://gavecoin.comExplorer: https://explorer.gavecoin.comDocumentation: https://docs.gavecoin.comGithub: https://github.com/gavecoinDiscord: https://discord.gg/ZT9bkExPEUTelegram: https://t.me/gavecoinContacts for communication:Email: static@gavecoin.comTelegram: https://t.me/GaveMasterDiscord: GaveCoin#4721Mining:Official Pool: https://pool.gavecoin.comDownload MinerWyvern CPU miner: https://github.com/WyvernTKC/cpuminer-gr-avx2/releasesXMRig CPU miner: https://github.com/xmrig/xmrigHow to Setup Smart Node:https://docs.gavecoin.com/#Install_Smartnodeno permine?? and Why two address have over 2 Million coins??AH wait waithttps://docs.gavecoin.com/#Install_Smartnode4. Install and Sync Local WalletCreate new directory:Windows - C:\Users\user\AppData\Roaming\GavecoinCoreLinux / MAC - ~/.gavecoincoreLaunch the wallet and let it complete the sync.Encrypt wallet (Settings > Encrypt wallet)Create a new pickup addressdumpprivkey "address" (address is the receiving address you sent the 1 million GVC to)Backup wallet.dat (File > Wallet Backup). Store in multiple locations.Dump the private key to get the address (it should be printed and kept offline in several places):The private key only allows you to restore the matching receiving address. If you setup multiple nodes you should dump the private key for each collateral receiving address.Send 1 million GVC to self (this is current collateral amount)Wait for 2 confirmations----they save the 1 million for a smart node ahhh

comments.body: Quote from: yaopool on July 26, 2022, 03:44:09 AMQuote from: Bacardi Toni on July 25, 2022, 09:37:36 PMQuote from: Bacardi Toni on July 25, 2022, 09:13:04 PMDiscord link to Yerbas?  It's better now      fork from Yerbas ,just change the name  and the block coins No. We are an improved fork of raptoreum!Our emission is burned with every transaction and there are less and less coins every day.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: "10% to a dead wallet from each transaction" so it is possible that the coin will cease to exist. i like that new coin popping off? if I were you I will add some bridge to other popular chain like eth or bnb to get more audience

comments.author: GaveCoin
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on July 27, 2022, 04:25:00 AM"10% to a dead wallet from each transaction" so it is possible that the coin will cease to exist. i like that new coin popping off? if I were you I will add some bridge to other popular chain like eth or bnb to get more audience Sorry, we have a typo in the top paragraph, not 10%, but 1% from each transaction. Over time, of course, we will sell the coin in other networks and make a bridge.
